sql:
SELECT
  mw.reqID,
  mw.Station,
  mw.vehNo,
  mw.servicetype,
  mw.description,
  mw.KMR,
  mw.requestedby,
  mw.requestedon,
  mw.arrivaltime,
  mw.arrivaldate,
  mw.vehType,
  mw.chasisNo,
  mw.repairInstruction,
  mw.KMRin,
  mw.KMRout,
  mw.WOreqBy,
  mw.WOreqOn,
  mw.status,
  mw.garage,
  mw.attachment,
  mw.stn_req_id,
  (SELECT r.REGION
     FROM regions r
     WHERE r.stations = mw.Station
     /* optionally choose a rule for “the” row: ORDER BY r.id DESC */
     LIMIT 1) AS REGION
FROM mentain_workorder mw
ORDER BY mw.reqID DESC;
name: mentain_workorder

placeholder.English: What exactly do you want to be done on the vehicle
Garage assigned to repair the vehicle
Any relevant document related to this repair order

fields.name: REGION
fields.sqlExpression:
(SELECT r.REGION
     FROM regions r
     WHERE r.stations = mw.Station
     /* optionally choose a rule for “the” row: ORDER BY r.id DESC */
     LIMIT 1)
